title: From Postgres to ScyllaDB NoSQL, with a 349x Speed Boost
author: Cynthia Dunlop
description: How Coralogix cut query processing times from 30 seconds to 86 milliseconds – and a peek at its next optimizations with WebAssembly and Rust.
cntitle: 从 Postgres 到 ScyllaDB NoSQL，速度提升 349 倍
cndescription: Coralogix 如何将查询处理时间从 30 秒缩短至 86 毫秒——以及对其使用 WebAssembly 和 Rust 进行的后续优化的一瞥。
